products.name: Fender Stratocaster
products.description: Classic electric guitar with versatile tone. Perfect for beginners and professionals alike. Features solid body construction and smooth fretboard.

products.name: Yamaha Grand Piano
products.description: Premium grand piano with 88 weighted keys. Exceptional sound quality and durability. Ideal for studios and concert halls.

products.name: Ludwig Drum Kit
products.description: Professional 5-piece drum kit. Includes snare, toms, kick drum, and hardware. Great for gigging musicians.

products.name: Stradivarius Violin
products.description: High-quality student violin with excellent projection. Hand-crafted by master luthiers. Perfect for serious students.

products.name: Flute Yamaha YFL-222
products.description: Beginner flute with closed hole keys. Produces clear, bright tones. Perfect for learning music.

products.name: Yamaha Trumpet YTR-2330
products.description: Professional-quality trumpet. Bright, projecting tone. Excellent for orchestras and jazz.

products.name: Fender Jazz Bass
products.description: Iconic jazz bass with warm, punchy tone. Perfect for session and touring musicians.

products.name: Gibson Les Paul
products.description: Legendary solid-body electric guitar. Rich, powerful tone. Favored by rock and blues musicians.
